name: Leona
title: the Radiant Dawn
lore:
''If you would shine like a sun, first you must burn like one.''

Imbued with the fire of the sun, Leona is a warrior templar of the Solari who defends Mount Targon with her Zenith Blade and Shield of Daybreak. Her skin shimmers with starfire while her eyes burn with the power of the celestial Aspect within her. Armored in gold and bearing a terrible burden of ancient knowledge, Leona brings enlightenment to some, death to others.
blurb:
''If you would shine like a sun, first you must burn like one.''

Imbued with the fire of the sun, Leona is a warrior templar of the Solari who defends Mount Targon with her Zenith Blade and Shield of Daybreak. Her skin shimmers with starfire ...
allytips_0: Lead the charge and mark your foes with Sunlight before your allies deal damage.
allytips_1: Shield of Daybreak and Zenith Blade form a powerful offensive combo.
allytips_2: You can absorb a huge amount of damage using Eclipse, but you must stay near enemies to gain the bonus duration.
enemytips_0: When Leona activates Eclipse, you have three seconds to get away from her before she deals damage.
enemytips_1: Only foes in the center of Solar Flare get stunned, so you can often avoid this if you're quick.

passive_description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 3.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight debuff to deal additional magic damage.
passive_sanitizedDescription: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 3.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight debuff to deal additional magic damage.
